1.title: High Maintenance/Blue/The Guild/Xfinity

episode of.title: We Like to Watch with Ari & Tamara (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: On this episode, Ari and Tamara review the Julia Stiles series "Blue" Vimeo's hit "High Maintenance" and Felicia Day's "The Guild" becomes the first entry into the Ultimate Playlist. On New Ways to Watch Ari and Tamara discuss the new Xfinity platform from Comcast.

2.title: Thurston/Sequestered/Battleground/iPhone 6 Plus

episode of.title: We Like to Watch with Ari & Tamara (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: On this episode we look at the indie western drama, "Thurston" the Crackle series "Sequestered" and for our Ultimate Playlist induction we add Hulu's "Battleground" We also talk about the iPhone 6 in our New Ways to Watch segment.

3.title: Video Game High School/Transparent/The Bannen Way/Long Form vs. Short Form

episode of.title: We Like to Watch with Ari & Tamara (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: This episode we do a special: you show me yours, and I'll show you mine, where Ari and Tamara each bring a show to share. See who wants to see you play Amazon's Tansparent and Freddie Wong's Video Game High School. And also hear about the latest show inducted into the Ultimate Playlist: The Bannen Way. Ari and Tamara also discuss long form vs. short form content.

imdb.title: We Like to Watch with Ari & Tamara
akas: We Like to Watch with Ari & Tamara (United States)
plot: We Like to Watch reviews these original series, bringing relevance to a growing medium beyond traditional film and TV, and answers the question: Play or Pass?::Allison Vanore
